original: @24b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @24b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni /
translated: The yogi/nī of the recitation of the name mantra cultivates the four immeasurables of the accumulation of wisdom, the result.

original: gong gi snying ga'i zla ba dang rdo rje'i aa de las 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par byed pa'i 'od zer kha dog dkar po byung ba des sems can thams cad la reg pa dang sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: gong gi snying ga'i zla ba dang rdo rje'i aa de las 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par byed pa'i 'od zer kha dog dkar po byung ba des sems can thams cad la reg pa dang sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
translated: From the moon and the a of the vajra at the heart, white light rays fill the world realm. They touch all sentient beings, and after they are free from suffering, they are endowed with happiness.

original: bde ba la yun ring bar gnas pa dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don du yun ring du bsgom mo //
analyzed: bde ba la yun ring bar gnas pa dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don du yun ring du bsgom mo //
translated: They abide for a long time in happiness, and they cultivate for a long time the meaning of the equality of phenomena.

original: 'od zer de'i phung po slar snying gar thim par bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer de'i phung po slar snying gar thim par bya'o //
translated: The mass of light rays dissolves back into the heart.

original: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
translated: The instruction for cultivating the four immeasurables is complete.
